alert.note: Alert for Little River (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 5:54PM CDT until April 20 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Bowie County in northeastern Texas... Northern Morris County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Titus County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of De Kalb to near Boxelder to near Wilkerson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... New Boston, Foreman, Hooks, De Kalb, Maud, Us 259 And I 30 Intersection, Dalby Springs, Avery, Almont, Spring Hill, Beaverdams, Goodlake, Lydia, Wallace, Arden, Red Bank and Bryans Mill. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
